lead_paragraph: The director of N.Y.U.’s Program for Survivors of Torture and a former Army interrogator discuss the immorality of the practice.

headline.print_headline: Torture Is Against ‘America’s Core Values and Security’
headline.main: Torture Is Against ‘America’s Core Values and Security’

snippet: The director of N.Y.U.’s Program for Survivors of Torture and a former Army interrogator discuss the immorality of the practice.
